RuleSet.Name: .gitattributes
RuleSet.GenFile: *.gitattributes text eol=lf diff *.gitignore text eol=lf diff *.md text eol=lf diff *.txt text eol=lf diff *.java text eol=lf diff *.cs text eol=lf diff *.xsd text eol=lf diff *.xml text eol=lf diff *.html text eol=lf diff *.pgsql text eol=lf diff *.sql text eol=lf diff *.plsql text eol=lf diff *.isql text eol=lf diff *.mysql text eol=lf diff *.tsql text eol=lf diff *.bash text eol=lf diff *.bat text eol=crlf diff *.rc text eol=lf diff *.db -text -diff *.ipch -text -diff *.jar -text -diff *.zip -text -diff *.ico -text -diff *.jpg -text -diff *.jpeg -text -diff *.gif -text -diff *.png -text -diff *.xsd text eol=lf diff *.xml text eol=lf diff *.html text eol=lf diff *.makefile text eol=lf diff *.am text eol=lf diff *.dat text eol=lf diff *.cs text eol=lf diff *.cpp text eol=lf diff *.hpp text eol=lf diff *.c text eol=lf diff *.h text eol=lf diff *.ac text eol=lf diff *.am text eol=lf diff *.sln text eol=crlf diff *.vcxproj text eol=crlf diff *.csproj text eol=crlf diff *.user text eol=crlf diff *.filters text eol=crlf diff
